scripts.capture-actual:prepare-directory: find src -type d | xargs -IVAL mkdir -p screenshot/VAL
scripts.capture-actual:main: find src -type f | xargs -IVAL node script/screenshot.js screenshot VAL
scripts.capture-expected:prepare-directory: find src -type d | xargs -IVAL mkdir -p expected/VAL
scripts.capture-expected:main: find src -type f | xargs -IVAL node script/screenshot.js expected VAL
scripts.type-check: find src -type f | xargs -IVAL elm make VAL --output=/dev/null
scripts.type-check:diff::branch:
npm run emit-diff::branch --branch=$npm_config_branch | tr ' ' '
' | cut -d'/' -f2- | awk '/.*.elm$/' | xargs npm run type-check::file
